title: Introducing: ZEE
body:
I’m not too sure what to make of **ZEE**.

In some ways, I love it and the obvious hat-tips to mid-to-late 90’s pop (N\*SYNC, A1, Blue etc.), yet merging with a more soulful, upbeat version of The Weeknd kind of vibe. His two debut demos, _Biggest Love_ and _Refugee_, are out and out pop numbers that, with slightly cleaner production, could easily make a run for the charts, yet all that said, I’m still on the fence about ZEE, and if anything, it’s the touches of **Pet Shop Boys** that make me believe that there’s something here.

His two debut demos, Biggest Love and Refugee, are out and out pop numbers \[…\]
